## QueryPagingInitializerComponent class

Component used for rendering query paging initializer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class QueryPagingInitializerComponent implements QueryPagingInitializer, GridPluginGeneric<QueryPagingInitializerOptions> 
```
